title: Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: Valley polarization in MoS2 monolayers by optical pumping
title_cn: 通过光泵浦在MoS2单层中的波谷极化
abstract: Most electronic devices exploit the electric charge of electrons, but it is also possible to build devices that rely on other properties of electrons. Spintronic devices, for example, make use of the spin of electrons. Valleytronics is a more recent development that relies on the fact that the conduction bands of some materials have two or more minima at equal energies but at different positions in momentum space. To make a valleytronic device it is necessary to control the number of electrons in these valleys, thereby producing a valley polarization. Single-layer MoS2 is a promising material for valleytronics because both the conduction and valence band edges have two energy-degenerate valleys at the corners of the first Brillouin zone. Here, we demonstrate that optical pumping with circularly polarized light can achieve a valley polarization of 30% in pristine monolayer MoS2. Our results, and similar results by Mak et al., demonstrate the viability of optical valley control and valley-based electronic and optoelectronic applications in MoS2 monolayers.
abstract_cn: 大多数电子设备都利用电子的电荷，但是也有可能构建依赖电子其他特性的设备。例如，自旋电子器件利用电子的自旋。 Valleytronics是一个较新的发展，它依赖于以下事实：某些材料的导带在相等的能量下但在动量空间中的不同位置处具有两个或多个最小值。为了制造波谷电子器件，必须控制这些波谷中的电子数量，从而产生波谷极化。单层MoS 2 对于谷电子学来说是一种很有前途的材料，因为导带和价带边缘在第一个布里渊区的拐角处都有两个能量退化的谷。在这里，我们证明圆偏振光的光泵浦可以在原始的单层MoS 2 中实现30％的谷底偏振。我们的结果以及Mak等人的类似结果证明了光学山谷控制以及基于山谷的电子和光电应用在MoS 2 单层中的可行性。

title: Control of valley polarization in monolayer MoS2 by optical helicity
title_cn: 通过光学螺旋控制单层MoS2的谷极化
abstract: Electronic and spintronic devices rely on the fact that free charge carriers in solids carry electric charge and spin. There are, however, other properties of charge carriers that might be exploited in new families of devices. In particular, if there are two or more minima in the conduction band (or maxima in the valence band) in momentum space, and if it is possible to confine charge carriers in one of these valleys, then it should be possible to make a valleytronic device. Valley polarization, as the selective population of one valley is designated, has been demonstrated using strain and magnetic fields, but neither of these approaches allows dynamic control. Here, we demonstrate that optical pumping with circularly polarized light can achieve complete dynamic valley polarization in monolayer MoS2 (refs ), a two-dimensional non-centrosymmetric crystal with direct energy gaps at two valleys. Moreover, this polarization is retained for longer than 1 ns. Our results, and similar results by Zeng et al., demonstrate the viability of optical valley control and suggest the possibility of valley-based electronic and optoelectronic applications in MoS2 monolayers.
abstract_cn: 电子和自旋电子设备依赖于这样的事实，即固体中的自由电荷载流子会携带电荷并自旋。但是，在新的设备系列中可能会利用电荷载流子的其他属性。特别是，如果在动量空间中导带中有两个或多个最小值（或价带中有最大值），并且有可能将电荷载流子限制在这些谷之一中，那么应该有可能制造一个谷电子器件。设备。使用应变和磁场已经证明了谷地极化（指定​​了一个谷地的选择性种群），但是这些方法均不允许动态控制。在这里，我们证明了利用圆偏振光进行的光泵浦可以在单层MoS 2 （refs＆＃160;）中实现完全动态的谷底偏振，这是一个二维非中心对称的晶体，在两个谷点处具有直接能隙。而且，该极化保持的时间超过1＆＃160; ns。我们的结果以及Zeng等人的类似结果证明了光谷控制的可行性，并暗示了在MoS 2 单层中基于谷的电子和光电应用的可能性。

title: Shift registers based on magnetic domain wall ratchets with perpendicular anisotropy
title_cn: 基于具有垂直各向异性的磁畴壁棘轮的移位寄存器
abstract: The movement of magnetic domain walls can be used to build a device known as a shift register, which has applications in memory and logic circuits. However, the application of magnetic domain wall shift registers has been hindered by geometrical restrictions, by randomness in domain wall displacement and by the need for high current densities or rotating magnetic fields. Here, we propose a new approach in which the energy landscape experienced by the domain walls is engineered to favour a unidirectional ratchet-like propagation. The domain walls are defined between domains with an out-of-plane (perpendicular) magnetization, which allows us to route domain walls along arbitrary in-plane paths using a time-varying applied magnetic field with fixed orientation. In addition, this ratchet-like motion causes the domain walls to lock to discrete positions along these paths, which is useful for digital devices. As a proof-of-principle experiment we demonstrate the continuous propagation of two domain walls along a closed-loop path in a platinum/cobalt/platinum strip.
abstract_cn: 磁畴壁的移动可用于构建称为移位寄存器的设备，该设备已在存储器和逻辑电路中得到应用。然而，磁畴壁移位寄存器的应用受到几何限制，畴壁位移的随机性以及对高电流密度或旋转磁场的需求的阻碍。在这里，我们提出了一种新的方法，其中设计了畴壁所经历的能量格局，以促进单向棘轮状传播。磁畴壁是在具有平面外（垂直）磁化的磁畴之间定义的，这使我们能够使用具有固定方向的时变施加磁场沿任意平面内路径路由磁畴壁。另外，这种棘轮状的运动使畴壁沿这些路径锁定到离散的位置，这对于数字设备很有用。作为原理验证实验，我们证明了两个畴壁在铂/钴/铂带中沿闭环路径的连续传播。

title: Metal–oxide–semiconductor field-effect transistor with a vacuum channel
title_cn: 具有真空通道的金属氧化物半导体场效应晶体管
abstract: High-speed electronic devices rely on short carrier transport times, which are usually achieved by decreasing the channel length and/or increasing the carrier velocity. Ideally, the carriers enter into a ballistic transport regime in which they are not scattered. However, it is difficult to achieve ballistic transport in a solid-state medium because the high electric fields used to increase the carrier velocity also increase scattering. Vacuum is an ideal medium for ballistic transport, but vacuum electronic devices commonly suffer from low emission currents and high operating voltages. Here, we report the fabrication of a low-voltage field-effect transistor with a vertical vacuum channel (channel length of ∼20 nm) etched into a metal–oxide–semiconductor substrate. We measure a transconductance of 20 nS µm–1, an on/off ratio of 500 and a turn-on gate voltage of 0.5 V under ambient conditions. Coulombic repulsion in the two-dimensional electron system at the interface between the oxide and the metal or the semiconductor reduces the energy barrier to electron emission, leading to a high emission current density (∼1 × 105 A cm–2) under a bias of only 1 V. The emission of two-dimensional electron systems into vacuum channels could enable a new class of low-power, high-speed transistors.
abstract_cn: 高速电子设备依赖于较短的载流子传输时间，这通常是通过减小通道长度和/或增加载流子速度来实现的。理想情况下，运载工具进入弹道运输制度，在这种制度下，他们不会分散。但是，由于用于增加载流子速度的高电场也会增加散射，因此很难在固态介质中实现弹道运输。真空是弹道运输的理想媒介，但是真空电子设备通常会遭受低发射电流和高工作电压的困扰。在这里，我们报告制造了一种具有垂直真空通道（通道长度为20 nm）的低电压场效应晶体管，该垂直通道被蚀刻到金属氧化物半导体衬底中。在环境条件下，我们测得的跨导为20 nS＆lt; m <sup>＆＃8211; 1 </ sup>，开/关比为500，导通栅极电压为0.5＆＃160; V。氧化物与金属或半导体之间的界面处的二维电子系统中的库仑排斥力降低了电子发射的能垒，从而导致高发射电流密度（＆＃8764; 1＆＃215; 10 <sup> 5 </ sup>＆＃160; A＆＃160; cm <sup>＆＃8211; 2 </ sup>）的偏差仅为1＆＃160; V。将二维电子系统发射到真空通道中可以实现新型的低功率，高速晶体管。</ p>

title: A hybrid on-chip optomechanical transducer for ultrasensitive force measurements
title_cn: 用于超灵敏力测量的混合片上光机换能器
abstract: Nanoscale mechanical oscillators are used as ultrasensitive detectors of force, mass and charge. Nanomechanical oscillators have also been coupled with optical and electronic resonators to explore the quantum properties of mechanical systems. Here, we report an optomechanical transducer in which a Si3N4 nanomechanical beam is coupled to a disk-shaped optical resonator made of silica on a single chip. We demonstrate a force sensitivity of 74 aN Hz−1/2 at room temperature with a readout stability better than 1% at the minute scale. Our system is particularly suited for the detection of very weak incoherent forces, which is difficult with existing approaches because the force resolution scales with the fourth root of the averaging time. By applying dissipative feedback based on radiation pressure, we significantly relax this constraint and are able to detect an incoherent force with a force spectral density of just 15 aN Hz−1/2 (which is 25 times less than the thermal noise) within 35 s of averaging time (which is 30 times less than the averaging time that would be needed in the absence of feedback). It is envisaged that our hybrid on-chip transducer could improve the performance of various forms of force microscopy.
abstract_cn: 纳米机械振荡器被用作力，质量和电荷的超灵敏检测器。纳米机械振荡器也已与光学和电子谐振器耦合，以探索机械系统的量子特性。在这里，我们报告了一个光机械换能器，其中Si 3 N 4 纳米机械束耦合到在单个芯片上由二氧化硅制成的盘形光学谐振器。我们证明了在室温下的力敏感度为74aN＆＃160; Hz ＆＃8722; 1/2 ，在分钟刻度下的读数稳定性优于1％。我们的系统特别适合于检测非常弱的非相干力，这对于现有方法来说是困难的，因为力的分辨率与平均时间的四次方成正比。通过应用基于辐射压力的耗散反馈，我们可以显着地放宽此约束，并且能够检测力谱密度仅为15的非相干力。＆＃8722; 1/2 （比热噪声小25倍），平均时间为35秒（比没有反馈时所需的平均时间小30倍）。可以设想，我们的混合片上传感器可以改善各种形式的力显微镜的性能。

title: Dispersion forces between ultracold atoms and a carbon nanotube
title_cn: 超冷原子与碳纳米管之间的分散力
abstract: Dispersion forces are long-range interactions between polarizable objects that arise from fluctuations in the electromagnetic field between them. Dispersion forces have been observed between microscopic objects such as atoms and molecules (the van der Waals interaction), between macroscopic objects (the Casimir interaction) and between an atom and a macroscopic object (the Casimir–Polder interaction). Dispersion forces are known to increase the attractive forces between the components in nanomechanical devices, to influence adsorption rates onto nanostructures, and to influence the interactions between biomolecules in biological systems. In recent years, there has been growing interest in studying dispersion forces in nanoscale systems and in exploring the interactions between carbon nanotubes and cold atoms. However, there are considerable difficulties in developing dispersion force theories for general, finite geometries such as nanostructures. Thus, there is a need for new experimental methods that are able to go beyond measurements of planar surfaces and nanoscale gratings and make measurements on isolated nanostructures. Here, we measure the dispersion force between a rubidium atom and a multiwalled carbon nanotube by inserting the nanotube into a cloud of ultracold rubidium atoms and monitoring the loss of atoms from the cloud as a function of time. We perform these experiments with both thermal clouds of ultracold atoms and with Bose–Einstein condensates. The results obtained with this approach will aid the development of theories describing quantum fields near nanostructures, and hybrid cold-atom/solid-state devices may also prove useful for applications in quantum sensing and quantum information.
abstract_cn: 色散力是可极化物体之间的远程相互作用，是由它们之间的电磁场波动引起的。已经观察到在诸如原子和分子的微观物体之间的分散力（范德华相互作用），在宏观物体之间（卡西米尔相互作用）以及在原子与宏观物体之间（卡西米尔＆amp; Polder相互作用）。已知分散力会增加纳米机械装置中组件之间的吸引力，影响纳米结构上的吸附速率，并影响生物系统中生物分子之间的相互作用。近年来，人们对研究纳米级系统中的分散力以及探索碳纳米管与冷原子之间的相互作用的兴趣日益增长。然而，对于诸如纳米结构的一般有限几何形状，开发色散力理论存在很大的困难。因此，需要新的实验方法，该方法能够超越对平面和纳米级光栅的测量，并且能够对孤立的纳米结构进行测量。在这里，我们通过将纳米管插入超冷rub原子云中并监测随时间从云中消失的原子，来测量between原子与多壁碳纳米管之间的分散力。我们对超冷原子的热云和Bose爱因斯坦凝聚物进行了这些实验。用这种方法获得的结果将有助于描述纳米结构附近量子场的理论的发展，并且冷原子/固态混合器件也可能被证明对量子感测和量子信息的应用有用。

title: Persistence of engineered nanoparticles in a municipal solid-waste incineration plant
title_cn: 工程纳米颗粒在市政固体废物焚化厂的持久性
abstract: More than 100 million tonnes of municipal solid waste are incinerated worldwide every year. However, little is known about the fate of nanomaterials during incineration, even though the presence of engineered nanoparticles in waste is expected to grow. Here, we show that cerium oxide nanoparticles introduced into a full-scale waste incineration plant bind loosely to solid residues from the combustion process and can be efficiently removed from flue gas using current filter technology. The nanoparticles were introduced either directly onto the waste before incineration or into the gas stream exiting the furnace of an incinerator that processes 200,000 tonnes of waste per year. Nanoparticles that attached to the surface of the solid residues did not become a fixed part of the residues and did not demonstrate any physical or chemical changes. Our observations show that although it is possible to incinerate waste without releasing nanoparticles into the atmosphere, the residues to which they bind eventually end up in landfills or recovered raw materials, confirming that there is a clear environmental need to develop degradable nanoparticles.
abstract_cn: 全世界每年焚化的垃圾超过1亿吨。然而，即使预计废物中工程纳米颗粒的存在会增加，对焚烧过程中纳米材料的命运知之甚少。在这里，我们表明引入到大规模垃圾焚烧厂中的氧化铈纳米颗粒与燃烧过程中的固体残留物松散结合，并且可以使用当前的过滤技术有效地从烟道气中去除。将纳米颗粒直接引入焚烧之前的废物中，或者引入离开焚化炉炉膛的气流中，该焚化炉每年处理200,000吨废物。附着在固体残留物表面上的纳米颗粒并未成为残留物的固定部分，也没有表现出任何物理或化学变化。我们的观察结果表明，尽管可以焚烧废物而不会将纳米颗粒释放到大气中，但它们所结合的残留物最终会进入垃圾填埋场或回收的原材料中，这证实了开发可降解纳米颗粒存在明显的环境需求。

title: Characterization of the motion of membrane proteins using high-speed atomic force microscopy
title_cn: 使用高速原子力显微镜表征膜蛋白的运动
abstract: For cells to function properly, membrane proteins must be able to diffuse within biological membranes. The functions of these membrane proteins depend on their position and also on protein–protein and protein–lipid interactions. However, so far, it has not been possible to study simultaneously the structure and dynamics of biological membranes. Here, we show that the motion of unlabelled membrane proteins can be characterized using high-speed atomic force microscopy. We find that the molecules of outer membrane protein F (OmpF) are widely distributed in the membrane as a result of diffusion-limited aggregation, and while the overall protein motion scales roughly with the local density of proteins in the membrane, individual protein molecules can also diffuse freely or become trapped by protein–protein interactions. Using these measurements, and the results of molecular dynamics simulations, we determine an interaction potential map and an interaction pathway for a membrane protein, which should provide new insights into the connection between the structures of individual proteins and the structures and dynamics of supramolecular membranes.
abstract_cn: 为使细胞正常运行，膜蛋白必须能够在生物膜内扩散。这些膜蛋白的功能取决于它们的位置，也取决于蛋白质和蛋白质与脂质之间的相互作用。然而，到目前为止，还不可能同时研究生物膜的结构和动力学。在这里，我们表明可以使用高速原子力显微镜表征未标记的膜蛋白的运动。我们发现，由于扩散限制的聚集，外膜蛋白F（OmpF）的分子广泛分布在膜中，尽管总体蛋白运动随膜中蛋白的局部密度大致成比例，但单个蛋白分子可以也会自由扩散或被蛋白质相互作用所困。使用这些测量结果以及分子动力学模拟的结果，我们确定了膜蛋白的相互作用势图和相互作用途径，这应该为单个蛋白的结构与超分子膜的结构和动力学之间的联系提供新的见解。

title: Vanadium pentoxide nanoparticles mimic vanadium haloperoxidases and thwart biofilm formation
title_cn: 五氧化二钒纳米粒子模拟钒卤代过氧化物酶并阻止生物膜形成
abstract: Marine biofouling—the colonization of small marine microorganisms on surfaces that are directly exposed to seawater, such as ships' hulls—is an expensive problem that is currently without an environmentally compatible solution. Biofouling leads to increased hydrodynamic drag, which, in turn, causes increased fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. Tributyltin-free antifouling coatings and paints based on metal complexes or biocides have been shown to efficiently prevent marine biofouling. However, these materials can damage the environment through metal leaching (for example, of copper and zinc) and bacteria resistance. Here, we show that vanadium pentoxide nanowires act like naturally occurring vanadium haloperoxidases to prevent marine biofouling. In the presence of bromide ions and hydrogen peroxide, the nanowires catalyse the oxidation of bromide ions to hypobromous acid (HOBr). Singlet molecular oxygen (1O2) is formed and this exerts strong antibacterial activity, which prevents marine biofouling without being toxic to marine biota. Vanadium pentoxide nanowires have the potential to be an alternative approach to conventional anti-biofouling agents.
abstract_cn: 海洋生物污损在海洋中直接接触海水的微小海洋微生物（例如船体）的定殖是一个昂贵的问题，目前尚无环境兼容的解决方案。生物污染导致流体动力阻力增加，进而导致燃料消耗和温室气体排放增加。基于金属络合物或杀菌剂的不含三丁基锡的防污涂料和油漆已显示可有效防止海洋生物污损。但是，这些材料会通过金属浸出（例如铜和锌）和细菌抵抗力而破坏环境。在这里，我们表明五氧化二钒纳米线的行为就像天然存在的卤化钒过氧化物酶一样，可以防止海洋生物污染。在存在溴离子和过氧化氢的情况下，纳米线催化溴离子氧化为次溴酸（HOBr）。形成单线态分子氧（ 1 O 2 ），它具有很强的抗菌活性，可以防止海洋生物结垢而对海洋生物无毒。五氧化二钒纳米线有望成为常规防污垢剂的替代方法。

title: Shear-stress sensitive lenticular vesicles for targeted drug delivery
title_cn: 剪切应力敏感的透镜状囊泡用于靶向药物输送
abstract: Atherosclerosis results in the narrowing of arterial blood vessels and this causes significant changes in the endogenous shear stress between healthy and constricted arteries. Nanocontainers that can release drugs locally with such rheological changes can be very useful. Here, we show that vesicles made from an artificial 1,3-diaminophospholipid are stable under static conditions but release their contents at elevated shear stress. These vesicles have a lenticular morphology, which potentially leads to instabilities along their equator. Using a model cardiovascular system based on polymer tubes and an external pump to represent shear stress in healthy and constricted vessels of the heart, we show that drugs preferentially release from the vesicles in constricted vessels that have high shear stress.
abstract_cn: 动脉粥样硬化导致动脉血管变窄，这导致健康动脉和狭窄动脉之间的内源性剪切应力发生显着变化。 可以通过这种流变学改变局部释放药物的纳米容器非常有用。 在这里，我们表明，由人工1,3-二氨基磷脂制成的囊泡在静态条件下是稳定的，但在剪切应力升高时释放其含量。 这些囊泡具有透镜状形态，这可能导致沿其赤道的不稳定性。 使用基于聚合物管和外部泵的模型心血管系统代表心脏健康和狭窄血管中的切应力，我们显示药物优先从具有高剪切应力的狭窄血管中的囊泡释放。

title: Erratum: Real-time single-molecule imaging of quantum interference
title_cn: 勘误：量子干扰的实时单分子成像
